My goal is to protect the citizens. I should start by moving boxes to block the demons' bolts. There are boxes above me, I can push the boxes downwards to create a wall.

Action: 3

There are several boxes ('#') scattered around. There are citizens at (12,1) and (12,2) that are going towards the output at right.
